p: To systematically benchmark our method, we used two spike-in data sets (data set D2 and D3) for evaluation of the performance of DEqMS compared with Limma, t test, EBRC and ROTS. In addition, variance stabilization normalization (Limma(vsn)) ( 29) and intensity-based moderated t test (Limma(trend = T)) ( 16) were also included in the comparison as previous studies have shown that variance is dependent on peptide intensity ( 29).
